pageTitle: Justice point - WoWWiki - Your guide to the World of Warcraft
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {105831=The Horde vendor, Gunra, is located in Orgrimmar on the roof of Grommash Hold, in the center of the Valley of Strength. She is standing beside Jamus'Vaz, the Valor Quartermaster., 104749=Justice Points can be spent at a faction-specific vendor (also known as the Justice Quartermaster) or at a vendor in Dalaran for Item Level 346 rare gear, which will cost 950-2200 JP depending on the slot of the item.}
textBeforeTable: Justice Points for WotLK Random Dungeons Outgrowing content by out-leveling it will result in the listed objectives no longer rewarding Justice Points. Thus, for Wrath of the Lich King content, no Justice Points will be rewarded for players levels 81 and above. The same rule applies for Burning Crusade content, which will also reward Justice Points. 70 Justice Points (up to 7 times per week) Cataclysm (85) Heroic boss 30 Justice Points Cataclysm (84-85) Normal boss in Grim Batol, Lost City of Tol'vir or Halls of Origination 140 Justice Points[3] Cataclysm (80-85) Normal dungeon daily 138 Justice Points Wrath of the Lich King (80) Weekly raid 23 Justice Points Wrath of the Lich King (80) Raid boss 23 Justice Points Wrath of the Lich King (80) Heroic dungeon 16 Justice Points Wrath of the Lich King (80) Heroic boss 12 Justice Points Wrath of the Lich King (68-80) Normal dungeon daily 10 Justice Points Completing chess encounter in Karazhan (at any level) Points Objective Justice Points are rewarded in level-appropriate dungeons and raids
textAfterTable: Time estimates assume a good but not exceptional group. Wipes will vastly increase the total, of course. Justice Points counts assume all bosses being downed during the run. Skip some, get less. Purchasable Rewards Magatha Silverton and Gunra sell equipment for Justice points Vendor information Item Cost  [Amulet of Dull Dreaming] 1,250 Apple-Bent Bough 950
